# GENERATED BY: test/help_test.dart

## Section 0
$ pub unpack --help
Downloads a package and unpacks it in place.
Will resolve dependencies in the folder unless `--no-resolve` is passed.

Usage: pub unpack package-name[:version]
-h, --help            Print this usage information.
    --[no-]resolve    Whether to do pub get in the downloaded folder
                      (defaults to on)
    --destination     Download the package in this dir
                      (defaults to ".")
    --repository      The package repository to download from
                      (defaults to "https://pub.dev")

Run "pub help" to see global options.
See https://dart.dev/tools/pub/cmd/pub-unpack for detailed documentation.
